page.title: 13EVENTS LOCAL NEWS LANCING SX
page.content: We collected different newspapers circulated in the Lancing area from the 18th to the 25th June 1985.We looked through them picking out important pieces of news.These newspapers were the Worthing Guardian Worthing and District Advertiser Worthing Gazette and Herald and The Evening Argus.These are some of the stories that involved Lancing and its people.Business Begins At Home.A couple bought their own council house in Lancing and have converted it into an old world _ style cottage,they were so pleased they have now set up their own business.Sad Dad's Night Of Trouble.A father from Sompting went out on the anniversary of his son's death and ended the evening smashing up a pub,causing damage worth Â£180 to the Buckingham Arms in Shoreham.
